title: 设置一个世界永远天亮或者黑夜
author: Jimkimhk

replies.author: SakuraKooi
replies.txt_content:
白天:
time set 0
gamerule doDaylightCycle false 
晚上:
time set 20000
gamerule doDaylightCycle false 
关闭:gamerule doDaylightCycle true

mc自带的gamerule停止掉时间即可
放一个命令方块，里面输入/time set 0（晚上是/time set 18000),然后用一个阳光传感器配合非门即可
